meanings.definition: A member of the working class.
meanings.sent1: The proletary worked hard in the factory.
meanings.sent2: The proletary union fought for better wages.
meanings.sent3: The proletary joked about needing a vacation.
meanings.sent4: In the city, the lights shone on the proletary like stars.
meanings.sent5: The sound of machinery filled the ears of the proletary.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the proletariat.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood had a proletary atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Her clothing style was simple and proletary.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a proletary decoration of tools.
meanings.sent4: The old building had a proletary charm.
meanings.sent5: The music had a proletary rhythm that resonated with the crowd.
